Hi everyone,

After spending 2 months on finalizing the renewal of my work Visa, and waiting on the answer, I can now focus on sharing all the good news:

1) My work visa got renewed for 3 more years.
2) An article was published about my recent work at the MET in “Le Journal du Vésinet”, the magazine of my hometown.
3) I voiced a French crow in the “Brawl Stars” game app commercial.
4) And finally, I got cast once again at The Metropolitan Opera, this time in La Fille du Régiment, in which I will be playing the role of the Notary starting Feb 7, opposite Kathleen Turner!

Here’s to 2019!

Much love to you all,

-Yohan
